Typealiases.html#/s:14JSQCoreDataKit22Pe.name: PersistentStoreOptions
Typealiases.html#/s:14JSQCoreDataKit22Pe.abstract: Describes the initialization options for a persistent store.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.name: name
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.abstract: The name of the Core Data model resource.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.name: bundle
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.abstract: The bundle in which the model is located.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.name: storeType
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.abstract: The type of the Core Data persistent store for the model.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.name: storeURL
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.abstract: The file URL specifying the full path to the store.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.name: modelURL
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.abstract: The file URL specifying the model file in the bundle specified by bundle.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.name: databaseFileName
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.abstract: The database file name for the store.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.name: managedObjectModel
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.abstract: The managed object model for the model specified by name.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.name: needsMigration
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:vV14JSQCor.abstract: Queries the meta data for the persistent store specified by the receiver

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:FV14JSQCor.abstract: Constructs a new CoreDataModel instance with the specified name and bundle.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:FV14JSQCor.name: removeExistingStore()
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:FV14JSQCor.abstract: Removes the existing model store specfied by the receiver.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:FV14JSQCor.name: migrate()
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:FV14JSQCor.abstract: Progressively migrates the persistent store of the CoreDataModel based on mapping models found in the model’s bundle.

Structs/CoreDataStackFactory.html#/s:FV1.abstract: Initializes a new CoreDataStack instance using the factory’s model and options.

Structs/CoreDataStackFactory.html.name: CoreDataStackFactory
Structs/CoreDataStackFactory.html.abstract: An instance of CoreDataStackFactory is responsible for creating instances of CoreDataStack.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:vC14JSQCor.name: mainContext
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:vC14JSQCor.abstract: The main managed object context for the stack, which operates on the main queue.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:vC14JSQCor.name: backgroundContext
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:vC14JSQCor.abstract: The background managed object context for the stack, which operates on a background queue.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:vC14JSQCor.name: storeCoordinator
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:vC14JSQCor.abstract: The persistent store coordinator for the stack. Both contexts are connected to this coordinator.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:FC14JSQCor.name: reset(onQueue:completion:)
